===Glyph origin===
{{Han etyl}}
{{liushu|p}} – originally an ''[[acorn]]''. The character acquired its current meaning of ''[[white]]'' from the color of the acorn’s flesh. The original meaning has been lost. (Compare {{zh-l|*自}} – originally “nose”, now “self”.)
